scripts.say: Canal Stronghold - Bay
Under the cover of the mist, the Siren forces encroached upon the Canal Stronghold.
However...
All right everyone, let's stick to the plan. Draw the enemies in, and work with the support fire from the stronghold to take them out.
Fortunately, we're well prepared for a war of attrition. We have enough supplies to withstand a siege for months.
At least, make sure none of these Sirens make it back alive!
Nice going, Casablanca! You really are amazing! You even managed to evacuate all the transports so skillfully!
Speak nothing of it. Escorting vessels falls within my ballpark. If anything, thanks for hearing my ideas out.
Correct ideas ought to be implemented, regardless of position or seniority.
I heard that this tactic is especially effective against mass-production Siren fleets that aren't lead by a humanoid-type.
But the fact that they've pushed us to take such measures...
All we can hope for is that Intrepid and the others are having good luck with their search...
Don't worry about them. If anyone is fit to lead in Enterprise's absence, it would be Essex.
BOOOOOM--!
What just happened...?!
One of the stronghold's turrets was just destroyed. I was afraid things wouldn't go so smoothly, even if it's just mass-produced enemies we're facing. Reno, Bremerton, how's the situation?
Um... They're ignoring us and heading straight towards the stronghold!
Did the plan fail? Were you not able to draw their fire?
It's no good. They're even ignoring our attacks. They're single-mindedly advancing on the stronghold!
They way they're moving makes my skin crawl, even if they aren't even sentient...
What villainous tactics! Throwing out mindless pawns like this! The hero within me screams out for justice!
They know nothing of compassion or consciousness towards even their own.
The Sirens truly are terrifying enemies.
Yeah... If they're shrugging off all our attacks like this, the stronghold's not going to be able to fend them off forever. How about a change in tactics?
If the Sirens are dead set in destroying the stronghold, then what we ought to do should be clear as well.
The stronghold's firepower is overwhelming compared to what us ships can muster. We can't afford to let it fall, no matter the cost.
We need to take the initiative, break their lines, and cut off their reinforcements...!
